00053 struct DLLDIR_IK KinematicParameters {
00054     double angleOffset;
00055     double angleStop;
00056     int epc;
00057     int encOffset;
00058     int rotDir;
00059 };

00063 class DLLDIR_IK KatanaKinematics {
00064 public:
00065     virtual ~KatanaKinematics() {}
00066

00080     typedef std::vector<int>    encoders;
